comments.raw_text: Currently OnProcessCrashed() in reftest.js only removes the crash dump file for the plugin, but it should also remove the dump file for the browser.  This bug has not been turning tests orange due to bug 705184.
comments.text: Currently OnProcessCrashed() in reftest.js only removes the crash dump file for the plugin, but it should also remove the dump file for the browser.  This bug has not been turning tests orange due to bug 705184.

comments.raw_text: This patch might well work, but it's hard to tell now that dom/plugins/test/reftest/pluginproblemui* have been permanently disabled.

WIP patch
